typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.PathologyDocumentClassification
typeDescription.description: Single aggregated annotation encapsulating the most relevant pathology report information.

featureDescription.name: category
featureDescription.description: The category of the document, e.g., MAMMA.

featureDescription.name: diagnosis
featureDescription.description: The code of the relevant diagnosis.

featureDescription.name: topography
featureDescription.description: The code of the relevant topography.

featureDescription.name: morphology
featureDescription.description: The code of the relevant morphology.

featureDescription.name: tumor
featureDescription.description: The TNM code of the relevant tumor.

featureDescription.name: node
featureDescription.description: The TNM code of the relevant node.

featureDescription.name: metastasis
featureDescription.description: The TNM code of the relevant metastasis.

featureDescription.name: tPrefix
featureDescription.description: It indicates that the tumor category is based on a pathological or a clinical examination.

featureDescription.name: nPrefix
featureDescription.description: It indicates that the node category is based on a pathological or a clinical examination.

featureDescription.name: mPrefix
featureDescription.description: It indicates that the metastasis category is based on a pathological or a clinical examination.

featureDescription.name: grading
featureDescription.description: The relevant grading.

featureDescription.name: location
featureDescription.description: The relevant location.

featureDescription.name: rClass
featureDescription.description: The relevant R-classification.

featureDescription.name: side
featureDescription.description: The relevant side, e.g., L, R, T.

featureDescription.name: lymphnodesAffected
featureDescription.description: !! DEPRECATED !! Please use the feature 'lnAffected'.

featureDescription.name: lymphnodesTested
featureDescription.description: !! DEPRECATED !! Please use the feature 'lnTested'.

featureDescription.name: sentinelLymphnodesAffected
featureDescription.description: !! DEPRECATED !! Please use the feature 'slnAffected'.

featureDescription.name: sentinelLymphnodesTested
featureDescription.description: !! DEPRECATED !! Please use the feature 'slnTested'.

featureDescription.name: lnAffected
featureDescription.description: The amount of affected lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: lnTested
featureDescription.description: The amount of tested lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: slnAffected
featureDescription.description: The amount of affected sentinel lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: slnTested
featureDescription.description: The amount of tested sentinel lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: thickness
featureDescription.description: The thickness of the skin tumor.

featureDescription.name: lymphaticInvasion
featureDescription.description: The invasion of the cancer to the lymphatic system.

featureDescription.name: vascularInvasion
featureDescription.description: The invasion of the cancer to the vascular system.

featureDescription.name: perineuralInvasion
featureDescription.description: The invasion of the cancer to the space surrounding a nerve.

featureDescription.name: punchesAffected
featureDescription.description: The number of affected punches.

featureDescription.name: punchesTested
featureDescription.description: The number of tested punches.

featureDescription.name: maxPunchInfestation
featureDescription.description: The carcinoma infestation of the most severely affected punch (in %).

featureDescription.name: resultDate
featureDescription.description: The date of the latest result/findings.

featureDescription.name: diagnosisDate
featureDescription.description: The date of the earliest diagnosis result.

featureDescription.name: scores
featureDescription.description: List of different scores, e.g. GleasonScore, ClarkLevel.

featureDescription.name: categoryAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the category of the document.

featureDescription.name: diagnosisConcept
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant diagnosis.

featureDescription.name: topographyConcept
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant topography.

featureDescription.name: morphologyConcept
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant morphology.

featureDescription.name: tumorAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant tumor.

featureDescription.name: nodeAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant node.

featureDescription.name: metastasisAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant metastasis.

featureDescription.name: ySymbolAnnotation
featureDescription.description: It indicates that the TNM is assessed after the patient has received therapy or treatment for cancer.

featureDescription.name: rSymbolAnnotation
featureDescription.description: It represents recurrent tumors after a disease-free interval.

featureDescription.name: aSymbolAnnotation
featureDescription.description: It represents cases where the classification of the tumor stage is made posthumously.

featureDescription.name: mSymbolAnnotation
featureDescription.description: It indicates the presence of multiple primary tumors in a particular anatomical region.

featureDescription.name: gradingAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant grading.

featureDescription.name: locationAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant location.

featureDescription.name: rClassAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant R-classification.

featureDescription.name: sideAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant side.

featureDescription.name: lymphnodesAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: sentinelLymphnodesAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the sentinel lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: thicknessAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the thickness of the skin tumor.

featureDescription.name: lymphaticInvasionAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the invasion of the cancer to the lymphatic system.

featureDescription.name: vascularInvasionAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the invasion of the cancer to the vascular system.

featureDescription.name: perineuralInvasionAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the invasion of the cancer to the space surrounding a nerve.

featureDescription.name: resultDateAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the date of the latest findings/result.

featureDescription.name: diagnosisDateAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the date of the earliest diagnosis result.

featureDescription.name: punchesAffectedAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the number of affected punches.

featureDescription.name: punchesTestedAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the number of tested punches.

featureDescription.name: maxPunchInfestationAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the carcinoma infestation of the most severely affected punch (in %).

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: The category of the annotation, e.g., final.

featureDescription.name: concept
featureDescription.description: The category of the annotation, e.g., final.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.BiopsyIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicators that document contains biopsy report.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.PunchIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicators that document contains punch report.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.ClarkLevel
typeDescription.description: Level of anatomical invasion of the melanoma in the skin.

featureDescription.name: level
featureDescription.description: The integer value of the clark level.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.BreslowScore
typeDescription.description: Depth of anatomical invasion of the melanoma in the skin.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: The value of the breslow score.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.PunchStatus
typeDescription.description: Status (AFFECTED, NOT_AFFECTED, UNKNOWN, EMPTY) of a punch sample.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.PunchSampleInfo
typeDescription.description: All information aggregated for a single punch sample.

featureDescription.name: identifier
featureDescription.description: The unique identifier that defines this punch sample.

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: The status of the punch sample.

featureDescription.name: affectedCount
featureDescription.description: The number of punches that are affected in this sample (if multiple punches belong to the sample).

featureDescription.name: multiplierCount
featureDescription.description: The number of punches in this sample (if multiple punches belong to the sample).

featureDescription.name: side
featureDescription.description: The side that the sample was taken from.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.PunchQuantifier
typeDescription.description: Represents a quantifier like "in two out of three punches" or "in all punches on the right".

featureDescription.name: affectedCount
featureDescription.description: The number of affected punches referred to by the PunchQualifier.

featureDescription.name: totalCount
featureDescription.description: The total number of punches referred to by the PunchQualifier.

featureDescription.name: side
featureDescription.description: The side that the PunchQuantifier refers to.

featureDescription.name: all
featureDescription.description: True if PunchQuantifier refers to ALL punches and False otherwise.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.PunchIdentifier
typeDescription.description: An identifier representing a punch sample.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: The (unique) identifier of a punch sample.

featureDescription.name: side
featureDescription.description: The side that the punch sample was taken from.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.SpecialAffectedPunchPara
typeDescription.description: Specific paragraph containing information about how many/which punches are affected.

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: The status of the punches in this paragraph.

featureDescription.name: quantifier
featureDescription.description: The PunchQuantifier of the paragraph (if given).

featureDescription.name: identifiers
featureDescription.description: List of identifier that the paragraph refers to.

featureDescription.name: affectedResult
featureDescription.description: The number of affected punches that this paragraph mentions.
